name: Kraps
description:
Simple prototype with rather simple IA that can seek for food depend how good are their sight.

Each creature have an energy level and must eat to survive and bread. They can starve to death if they can't compete with the others. Faster the creature are, quicker they will use their energy.

The creatures will evolve with time, each generation will ave to survive and the bests will give birth to the next generation.

Evolution may affect colors, speed, and sight.
